``` ::: ::: # Origin {#origin} Pecten Pubis @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020 # Insertion {#insertion} Femur (pectineal line and proximal linea aspera) @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020 # Innervation {#innervation} - [Femoral N.]({{< var ref-femoral-nerve.path >}}), ref-obturator-nerve ([L2]({{< var ref-nerve-root.l2 >}}), [L3]({{< var ref-nerve-root.l3 >}})) @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020 # Action {#action} - **Hip joint**: ER, ADD, slight flex - **Pelvis**: Stabilization in coronal and sagittal plane
